After a superb first crack at making a GPL movie, Johnny X has applied everything he learned during movie #1 to his new movie. Currently untitled, almost 2 mins is complete and looks sensational. Very much like GXTrackers style of movie making but with that Johnny X flair. Lots of fast paced action and supreme synching of the clips to the music will make this movie a 'must watch'. Now we sit and wait :)

Steve 'GXTracker' Wilton has once again made another master piece. Here's what he had to say when he released it. The movie is based on my "learning process" of the Isle of Man Track by Jim Pearson. Consider this my tribute to such a wonderful track - one that shows off how far GPL can really go in terms of image quality. The movie is filled with mainly AI driving, but there are online clips as well. One reason I stay away from online clips is that the warp effect really distracts from the goal of my projects IMHO. Don't expect any fancy special effects, or engaging storyline - you can look at the other movie gurus for that kind of inspiration. Enjoy, and like always - questions/comments/thoughts/opinions are always welcome. Get the movie here http://jason.speedgeezers.com/btsgpl.zip

Now my first impression was 'wow cool, great idea' the one that followed was 'man, they can use a bit of spice on this Blogger'. As I will only be messing with the way things look, all data will at any time be available to everyone. It may just look a little different from time to time when I try things out. Please feel free to send me any comments or suggestions you might have at urlLink Overstear@gmail.com . Together we'll make it a nice one I'm sure.
